name: Bit Bag
features: Automatically re-stocks and stores bits that you pick up and use.
Holds 63 stacks of bits inside of it.
Stores 512 ( by default ) bits per stack, instead of 64.
Has a button which allows you to clear the contents of the bag easily.
Combine and sort its contents with a button. ( 14.28 and up )
Drag a stack of bits over the delete button to delete only those bits. ( 11.4 / 10.12 and up )
Craft with any dye to color the bag, craft a dyed bag with a water bucket to remove dye. ( 14.28 and up )

name: Diamond Bit Saw
features: Cut symmetrical blocks in half.
Quickly and easily cut blocks into slabs, panels, or other cuboid shapes.

name: Bit Tank
features: Convert buckets of fluid into bits.
Convert fluid bits back into buckets of fluids.

name: Diamond Chisel
features: Can chisel up to 194 complete blocks by default
Allows removing bits from blocks in the world.
Has various modes, single bit, line, plane, and more.
Can harvest any material that requires a diamond pick.

controls.action: There is an optional key bind for each mode.

name: Golden Chisel
features: Can chisel up to about a quarter of a block by default
Allows removing bits from blocks in the world.
Has various modes, single bit, line, plane, and more.
Can harvest any material that requires a gold pick.

controls.action: There is an optional key bind for each mode.

name: Iron Chisel
features: Can chisel up to 71 complete blocks by default
Allows removing bits from blocks in the world.
Has various modes, single bit, line, plane, and more.
Can harvest any material that requires a iron pick.

controls.action: There is an optional key bind for each mode.

name: Stone Chisel
features: Can chisel up to 2 complete blocks by default
Allows removing bits from blocks in the world.
Has various modes, single bit, line, plane, and more.
Can harvest any material that requires a stone pick.

controls.action: There is an optional key bind for each mode.

name: Positive Chisel Design
features: Clone exact blocks in world.
Can be used to craft copies in a crafting table with bit bags and other bits.
Can be cleared and reused.
Use Menu to rotate around the X and Z axis. ( 14.28 and up )
Has 4 Modes of operation. ( 11.4 / 10.12 and up )
Replace: Classic mode the target block is replaced with the design.
Additive: Only add bits where they will fit.
Impose : Add and replace bits, but do not remove them.
Placement: Place the pattern as if it were a chiseled block.

controls.action: Apply design from item to target block

name: Negative Chisel Design
features: Transfer shapes between materials
Can be inverted in the crafting table.
Use Menu to rotate around the X and Z axis. ( 14.28 and up )
Can be cleared and reused.

controls.action: Apply design from item to target block

name: Mirror Chisel Design
features: Reverse the bits along a specific axis.
Can be converted into a positive or negative chisel design.
Can be cleared and reused.

controls.action: Store design in item, clicked on face is mirrored.

name: Wooden Wrench
features: Rotate any forge compatible blocks by right clicking on the side to rotate around.

controls.action: Rotate clicked block around axis for selected face.

name: Tape Measure
features: Measure Distances using 3 modes.
Bit Mode: Measures bit level distances as a 3d cube.
Block Mode: Measures block level distances as a 3d cube.
Distance Mode; Measures the distance between the start and end point at a bit level.

name: Magnifying Glass
features: Allows you to easily figure out what block is chiselable.
